hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/GroupementMerVie; USER=groupemebh PASS=Palmier10Palmier10 HOST=ftp.cluster020.hosting.ovh.net
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=1 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/www -X www/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='GroupementMerVie' WPDBVERSION=`cat wp-includes/version.php | grep "wp_version =" | cut -d \' -f 2` WPPLUGIN=`find wp-content/plugins/ -type d -maxdepth 1 | cut -f3 -d '/'` URL='https://www.groupement-mer-vie.fr/' TYPE='wordpress' SERV='' FAVICON='https://www.groupement-mer-vie.fr/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/Logo_mereetvie.png' curl https://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV&favicon=$FAVICON"
